title: Christopher Knight Home Hedda Tufted Fabric Storage Ottoman, Wheat, Dark Brown
features: CONTEMPORARY DESIGN: Featuring clean lines and smooth upholstery, our storage ottoman offers the look, feel, and design of a truly contemporary piece. With a minimalistic yet refined structure, this set brings out a simplistic style that emphasizes comfort and functionality.

TUFTED WAFFLE STITCH: The button-tufted stitching in the lid offers an extra touch of sophistication that enhances its contemporary design. The waffle stitch pattern adds a bit of texture without sacrificing any comfort.
STORAGE SPACE: This ottoman comes with ample storage space for all of your pillows and blankets. This uses pressure hinges so that the lid will stay open on its own and will also ensure a soft close.
UPHOLSTERED: Our ottoman is generously upholstered, giving any room a refined appearance. This provides a smooth, immaculate texture for this piece as well as a plush lid for sitting.

DIMENSIONS: Choose an accessory that is the perfect size for you and your furniture. This storage ottoman is 31. 00” W x 31. 00” D x 18. 60” H. You will love how much your space can transform with the simple addition of this charming ottoman.
description: Unclutter your home and elevate the style of your decor all in one go by bringing home our charming storage ottoman. This ottoman features smooth, refined upholstery and delicate tufted waffle stitching in its lid which makes this perfect for any room in your home in need of a handy and contemporary upgrade. Finished with a simple, clean design and soft-closing pressure hinges, our ottoman will blend seamlessly with your interior space while also boasting convenient storage space for you to utilize. Includes: One (1) Storage Ottoman Material: Fabric Composition: 100% Polyester Leg Material: Birch Color: Wheat Leg Finish: Dark Brown Hand-Crafted Details Assembly Required Dimensions: 31. 00 inches deep x 31. 00 inches wide x 18. 60 inches high
